question: What is the origin of the KDPM2DiscreteScheduler with ancestral sampling in ComfyUI-MuseV, and who created the scheduler?
answer: The KDPM2DiscreteScheduler with ancestral sampling in ComfyUI-MuseV is inspired by the paper 'Elucidating the Design Space of Diffusion-Based Generative Models,' and the scheduler is ported from and created by Katherine Crowson, with the original codebase sourced from Katherine's repository at [crowsonkb/k-diffusion](https://github.com/crowsonkb/k-diffusion).
